abstract: Stock market closes down for third straight day as investors dump technology and biotech companies.
lead_paragraph: Stocks headed lower again as quarter-end window-dressing and a slump in durable goods orders at American factories undermined sentiment.

headline.main: Third Day of Losses for Market After Durable Goods Report Misses Expectations
headline.print_headline: Shares Slide Again, Hobbled by Tech

snippet: Stocks headed lower again as quarter-end window-dressing and a slump in durable goods orders at American factories undermined sentiment.
